p: In line with the somewhat weaker AMOC in N96ORCA1, the poleward oceanic heat transports are also somewhat smaller compared to N216ORCA025. Figure 12 shows that in three out of four latitudes where observation‐based estimates (Ganachaud & Wunsch, 2003) are available, the higher‐resolution version of GC3.1 matches these more closely. However, at 47°N, N96ORCA1 appears to be closer to observations, while it is within uncertainty estimates at the other locations.
